projects.name: Origin Trail
projects.description:
Origin trail is a narrative traveling game about grief, impermanence, and seeing the sunset at the end of the world.

My role on the team is that of a programmer and designer.

Built in Unity by the Everything is Temporary Team at UC Santa Cruz.

projects.name: MNK Simulator
projects.description:
An efficient simulator to play some subsets of MNK (M by N board, K in a row to win).

The final version of the simulator will contain python bindings for DL frameworks such as Keras as well as a built-in MCTS-based AI.

Currently under construction.
